Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.mailbox

Non-blocking, Atomic and Thread-bound Mailboxes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Inbox
    A message queue used in the Mailbox.
    Mailbox
    A mailbox implements an inbox for incoming messages (events/requests) and buffers outgoing messages by destination mailbox.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AtomicInbox  
    AtomicMailbox  
    MailboxBase
    Base class for mailboxes.
    NonBlockingInbox
    A default Inbox implementation, using a ConcurrentLinkedQueue for cross-thread message exchanges, and a ArrayDeque for same-thread message exchanges.
    NonBlockingMailbox  
    ThreadBoundMailbox  
    UnboundMailbox
    Implements mailbox that is not bound to a single thread.
